com.yahoo.bullet.storm.batching

Class Partition<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.bullet.storm.batching.Partition<T>

  • public class Partition<T>
extends Object
    Partitions have a max capacity of batch size times batch count. When the maximum capacity is exceeded, the partition is resized, and the number of batches is doubled. When the partition size drops under the minimum capacity (25% of the maximum capacity), the number of batches is halved. (When the batch count is 1, the minimum capacity is 0)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Partition(int id, int batchSize, boolean batchCompressEnable)
      Creates a Partition with the given id and batch size.

    • Method Summary

      void add(String key, T value)
      Adds a key-value pair to a random batch in the partition if the key does not already exist in the partition.
      void clear()
      Clears the partition of all keys without resizing.
      void compress()
      Compresses the batches that have changed (had a key added or removed).
      List<Map<String,T>> getImmutableBatches()
      Get the List of batches.
      List<byte[]> getImmutableData()
      Get the batches compressed as a List of byte data.
      void remove(String key)
      Removes a key and its associated value from the partition if the key is present.
      void resize()
      Resizes the partition if the total number of keys exceeds the maximum capacity or falls below the minimum capacity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Partition

        public Partition(int id,
                 int batchSize,
                 boolean batchCompressEnable)
        Creates a Partition with the given id and batch size.
        Parameters:
        id - The id of the partition.
        batchSize - The approximate maximum number of elements in a batch.
        batchCompressEnable - Whether or not to serialize and compress batches.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(String key,
                T value)
        Adds a key-value pair to a random batch in the partition if the key does not already exist in the partition. If the key already exists, then nothing happens.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to add.
        value - The value to associate with the key to add.

      • remove

        public void remove(String key)
        Removes a key and its associated value from the partition if the key is present.
        Parameters:
        key - The key to remove.

      • resize

        public void resize()
        Resizes the partition if the total number of keys exceeds the maximum capacity or falls below the minimum capacity. The maximum capacity is the number of batches times the batch size. The minimum capacity is a quarter of the maximum capacity.

      • compress

        public void compress()
        Compresses the batches that have changed (had a key added or removed).

      • getImmutableBatches

        public List<Map<String,T>> getImmutableBatches()
        Get the List of batches.
        Returns:
        The List of batches in this partition.

      • getImmutableData

        public List<byte[]> getImmutableData()
        Get the batches compressed as a List of byte data.
        Returns:
        The List of byte data that represents the compressed batches in this partition.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears the partition of all keys without resizing.
